Delivery Big Rules

Big Rules

First remember our number one principleâ€¦
Principled Behavior Over Prescriptive Action

All projects must:

  • Have value stories defined so the team can explain why Pillar is doing the project for the client.
  • Have a product release roadmap.
  • Establish and operate under a regular predictable cadence.
  • Have Big and Visible Progress.
  • Track velocity and forecast scope delivery.
  • Deliver valuable working software to production at least every 3 months.
  • Make Project Health Big & Visible (Project, Client, Pillarand Team)
